description: Learn PHP programming through this series of tutorials covering topics not intended for beginners. If you are looking for PHP basic tutorials, check out my other series. These advanced tutorials will cover things such as object oriented programming, regular expressions, sockets, server programming, web crawling, search engines, and various random projects and demos. Feel free to suggest a topic or a specific article or tutorial.
